Not itchy or anything. I hope this helps.

I liked the black pair I received so I purchased a blue one. However, since the fabric was now lighter I immediately noticed all the remaining thread tails left over. Also, unfortunately, many of these stitches are not backstitched, so it's very easy for things to unravel if you pull. With extended wear, you know this is just a disaster waiting.  Of course, I checked the black pair I've owned since Oct and thread tails are indeed sticking out. Even worse, because I've been wearing these already and washed them, some of the threads have indeed already unraveled and just like the blue one - many of these threads were not backstitched UGH. The stretchy part in the back in now in danger so I'll have to sew/stitch this myself to save the pants. Not sure these pants are worth the hassle for the cost, you could get one from a reputable brand that finishes the stitches for the same price.  Also you definitely need to iron these pants once you get them because of wrinkles.
I love these pants. They look super cute with either a crop top or tucked in shirt. The size chart seemed accurate and they fit as expected. Quality of material is great too.

评论概述: Not meant for long term use
评论详情: I'm 5' 1" and I weight 130lbs and these pants fit really big. Even with a belt they were not very flattering and I ordered a small.
